messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Samurai wargaming castles
messages.msgSnippet: I am not a wargamer but have painted 15mm and 25mm figures for display. One company that I have found very useful (and helpful) are Village Green . They
messages.messageBody:
I am not a wargamer but have painted 15mm and 25mm figures for display. One
company that I have found very useful (and helpful) are "Village Green".
They produce a series of resin cast "Samurai" bits...

Check it out:
http://www.apollo948.freeserve.co.uk/VG.html

Regards
Rod


----- Original Message -----
From: "ggouveia312000" <ggouveia@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 01, 2002 5:24 PM
Subject: [samuraihistory] Samurai wargaming castles


> Does anyone know of any good samurai wargaming model castles in card,
